creator: mkhitrov@gmail.com
text: When using mod_ldap with SSL/TLS, specifying an unreadable CA certificate file for LDAPTrustedGlobalCert directive causes a cryptic "[LDAP: ldap_start_tls_s() failed][Connect error]" message during authentication. It would be much easier to debug this if a check was done at start-up to make sure that the file or directory specified is readable by the httpd process.
